column4: hey everyone.... i'm trying to install Ardour, but add/remove apps says.... "Ardour GTK cannot be installed on your computer type (i386)", but when i do "uname -a" i get "Linux matt-desktop 2.6.17-10-generic #2 SMP Tue Dec 5 22:28:26 UTC 2006 i686 GNU/Linux"
ardour is a digital audio workstation
